Reviews.Content: express thanks carlton hotel kings cross accommodating busy friday night 130am perfectly acceptable single ensuite price booked corner awful spend night matter nigel receptionist extremely helpful basic comfortable pleasant decor tv teacoffee facilities clean furnished ensuite ventilation sound proofing location cant short break london

Reviews.Title: “Carlton near Kings Cross”
Reviews.Author: twadders
Reviews.Content: trawling lots reviews london hotels booked triple 2 nights found convenient kings cross st pancras stations offered quieter newly refurbished building short walk road approx 50 yards 6 clean expect newly refurbished fitted purpose clean reasonably spacious tv drink facilities shower 810 issue wardrobe facing wrong looked fall reason breakfast included english help yourself service fill self paid 2 nights 3 class reasonable london hotel stations close breakfast included

Reviews.Title: “Ok for the price”
Reviews.Author: Leena79
Reviews.Content: stayed carlton nights price payed didnt expect nice clean cleaned day 3 people actually double bed single bed sofa bed bathroom clean wasnt hot water managed breakfast english breakfast buffet ok price kept time location near kings cross excellent luxury hotel nice budget alternative

Reviews.Title: “Great Location in London”
Reviews.Author: countryboy_10
Reviews.Content: stayed carlton hotel july 2010 location hotel advantageous travel london hotel literally 1 minute cross station arrived via tube heathrow departed via eurostar st pancras station adjacent kings cross tube able travel attractions looking visit paid 80 price london basic suited wireless internet available air conditioning found hot resisted window traffic streets hours night maybe request street breakfast satisfactory traditional english breakfast recommend accommodation based price location provided stand absence air conditioning
